localizedMeta.description:
THIS CONTENT IS NOT COMPATIBLE WITH Androidâ„¢ DEVICES.

You're a chicken with only 2 bullets. Survive as long as you can, collect your bullets after each shot, and gather up some golden eggs in the process. In old arcade fashion, continually seek to beat your high score!

Package size: 51 MB - More storage space required for install

Compatibility information:
Number of players for local play: 1 Player

Supported interfaces/sensors
- Controller / On-screen controller

Supported languages:
English(United States)
